description: Demo content for Retail & E-commerce industry template - perfect for online stores, retail shops, and e-commerce businesses

company.name: Urban Style Boutique
company.description: Discover unique fashion pieces, accessories, and lifestyle products at Urban Style Boutique. Quality products, competitive prices, and exceptional customer service.

hero.title: Welcome to Urban Style
hero.subtitle: Discover curated fashion and lifestyle products that express your unique style. Quality pieces, competitive prices, fast shipping.
hero.alt: Modern boutique interior with fashion displays

products.title: Featured Products
products.subtitle: Handpicked items from our latest collections

featured_products.name: Vintage Denim Jacket
featured_products.description: Classic vintage-inspired denim jacket with modern fit. Perfect for layering and everyday style.

featured_products.name: Minimalist Watch
featured_products.description: Elegant minimalist watch with stainless steel case and leather strap. Timeless design meets modern functionality.

featured_products.name: Organic Cotton Tee
featured_products.description: Soft organic cotton t-shirt in classic fit. Comfortable, sustainable, and versatile for any occasion.

featured_products.name: Leather Crossbody Bag
featured_products.description: Genuine leather crossbody bag with adjustable strap. Perfect for everyday use with elegant styling.

about.title: Our Story
about.description: Urban Style Boutique was founded with a passion for curating unique fashion pieces that help people express their individual style. We believe fashion should be accessible, sustainable, and personal.

features.title: Quality Products
features.description: Carefully selected items from trusted designers and manufacturers

features.title: Fast Shipping
features.description: Free shipping on orders over $50 with fast delivery options

features.title: Style Advice
features.description: Personal styling advice and outfit inspiration

collections.title: Shop Collections
collections.subtitle: Explore our curated collections for every style and occasion

collections_data.name: New Arrivals
collections_data.description: Latest pieces fresh from the runway

collections_data.name: Summer Essentials
collections_data.description: Light, breezy pieces for warm weather

collections_data.name: Workwear
collections_data.description: Professional pieces for the modern workplace

collections_data.name: Accessories
collections_data.description: Complete your look with our accessory collection

shipping.title: Shipping Information
shipping.content: Free shipping on orders over $50. Standard delivery 3-5 business days. Express options available.

returns.title: Returns & Exchanges
returns.content: 30-day return policy. Items must be unworn with tags attached. Free return shipping.

size_guide.title: Size Guide
size_guide.content: Detailed size measurements and fit information available for all products.

contact.title: Contact Urban Style
contact.description: Have questions about our products or need styling advice? We're here to help!

footer.description: Curated fashion and lifestyle products for the modern individual since 2018.

seo.meta_description: Shop unique fashion and lifestyle products at Urban Style Boutique. Quality clothing, accessories, and home goods with fast shipping and easy returns.
seo.keywords: fashion boutique, online shopping, clothing store, accessories, lifestyle products, fashion retail
